Uses of Class
io.atomix.catalyst.serializer.SerializerRegistry

  • Packages that use SerializerRegistry 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.catalyst.serializer
    Provides a fast serialization framework built on the Buffer abstraction.

    • Uses of SerializerRegistry in io.atomix.catalyst.serializer
